idea: Legal Saheb Business Solutions Private Limited thrives to solve the problem regarding availing professional services by common people and early stage startups. We have a team of professional with different expertise which help proprietors, startups and corporate bodies to address their compliance requirements in a timely, accurate and professional manner at affordable rates. We offer flexible pricing structure and immediate response for those seeking professional services and advisory. Our expertise is in fields of secretarial services, accounting services, IPR, MSME, Incorporation services, due diligence and foreign law compliances to name a few. Our vision is to become most preferred company for professional services in India through timely delivery at best competitive rates across the country.
name: LEGAL SAHEB BUSINESS SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: PSL Retail Private Limited is a whole owned subsidiary of Purple Style Labs Private Limited incorporated on 28th August 2019. It is India’s fastest growing Luxury Fashion House with omni-channel presence. It focuses multichannel approach to sales that focus on providing a seamless customer experience whether the client is shopping online from a mobile device, a laptop, or in a brick-and-mortar store. PSL acquired Pernia’s Pop-Up Shop to become the market leader in Luxury E-commerce. It is leveraging a strong online presence, PSL Retail setup experience studios in Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata.
name: PSL RETAIL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The startup is aimed at implementing a complete end to end design and development of a solar PV system.

 Our prime focus will be on the design of hardware and the software solution for Solar PV operation and maintenance (O & M) including remote monitoring which is important to reduce time and the cost associated with site visits. The system must be compatible to various inverters. 

After the solar plant has been installed and starts functioning, a standard analysis needs to be done so as to ensure consistency and quality of power generated.

The demand of remote monitoring system is driven by the need to receive quick notification and to act upon eliminating power interruption at sites, facilitate trouble shooting, operation and maintenance, remotely update firmware, etc.
name: JD ENERBIZ PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We strive to drive productivity in enterprises through our comprehensive suite of product & services aligning to their Learning & Development needs. name: Learning Linkups Private Limited
